text: Arau sihamta ubhayara majata thakiba parda, arau a’raaphara majata thakiba kichumana loka, yisakale pratyekake tara cihnara dbaraa cini paba. Sihamte jannatabasisakalaka sambodhana karai ka’ba, ‘chalama barsita ha'omka tomalokara oparata’. Sihamta tetiyalaike jannatata praraesa karaa na'i kintu akanksa karae
